column34: Variant – same constr or diff reading

column31: saṅkhārā ca h'idaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissaṃsu, na'y'idaṃ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvatteyyuṃ, labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun'ti.

column5: ind, adv, abl sg of ābādha
column11: as disease, as sickness, as illness, as affliction
column28: so yad'eva tattha hoti rūpagataṃ vedanāgataṃ saññāgataṃ saṅkhāragataṃ viññāṇagataṃ, te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato samanupassati.
ahaṃ kho pubbe ābādhiko ahosiṃ dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, bhattañ'ca me nacchādesi, na ca me āsi kāye balamattā
column31: ambho purisa, na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ, sake muttakarīse palipannaṃ semānaṃ, aññehi vuṭṭhāpiyamānaṃ, aññehi saṃvesiyamānan'ti?

column28: ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yen'ayyo ānando ten'upasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda, itthannāmā, bhante, bhikkhunī ābādhikinī dukkhitā bāḷhagilānā.

column5: adj, pp of bahulīkaroti, comp vb
column11: not practised often, not fully developed, not cultivated, not increased
column28: evam'eva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kāyagatāsati abhāvitā abahulīkatā, taṃ cakkhu āviñchati manāpiyesu rūpesu, amanāpiyā rūpā paṭikūlā honti
column31: evam'eva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettācetovimutti abhāvitā abahulīkatā so suppadhaṃsiyo hoti amanussehi.

column11: weak, feeble, not strong, not powerful
column28: so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ime pañca āvaraṇe nīvaraṇe cetaso ajjhāruhe paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe appahāya, abalāya paññāya dubbalāya att'atthaṃ vā ñassati
column31:
jiṇṇo'ham'asmi abalo vītavaṇṇo,
nettā na suddhā savanaṃ na phāsu,
m'āhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāva,
ācikkha dhammaṃ yam'ahaṃ vijaññaṃ,
jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ.

column11: weak, feeble, not strong, not powerful
column28: so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ime pañca āvaraṇe nīvaraṇe cetaso ajjhāruhe paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe appahāya, abalāya paññāya dubbalāya att'atthaṃ vā ñassati
column31:
jiṇṇo'ham'asmi abalo vītavaṇṇo,
nettā na suddhā savanaṃ na phāsu,
m'āhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāva,
ācikkha dhammaṃ yam'ahaṃ vijaññaṃ,
jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ.

column28: nivatth'avatthen'eva gehato nikkhamitvā paramasallekhavuttiko'pi abalabalo amandamando viya paresaṃ acittakarūpena hīḷitaparibhūto hutvā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ekarattivāsen'eva vicarati.

column11: governing rule which affects those that follow
column28:
adhikāre maṅgale c'eva, nipphanne c'āvadhāraṇe,
anantare c'apādāne, athasaddo pavattati.
